text: "Bet That" is a 2006 song by American rapper Trick Daddy and American rapper Chamillionaire and Gold Ru$h. It is the first single from Trick Daddy's seventh studio album Back by Thug Demand. The song was at Number 66 on the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart. A remix was also made and it features Ja Rule. == References == Category:2006 songs Category:Chamillionaire songs Category:Songs written by Chamillionaire
title: Bet That
